articles.title: Single-cell RNA Seq Method Accurately Quantifies Cell-specific Drug Effects - Technology Networks
articles.description: Researchers have developed a method to accurately assess the effect of specific drugs in isolated pancreatic tissue by using a refined single-cell RNA sequencing method.

articles.title: Watching the Skies: Moon passes 3 planets - WOODTV.com
articles.description: If you don’t mind the cold and want to head outside before sunrise, you’ll be treated to a neat view of the moon and three morning planets.
articles.content: GRAND RAPIDS, Mich. (WOOD) There are some cool nights ahead this week, but there are also clear skies in the forecast. If you don’t mind the cold and want to head outside before sunrise, you’ll be treated to a neat view of the moon and three morning planets.… [+1004 chars]

articles.title: New study wants astronauts to use their pee to build a lunar base - Inverse
articles.description: A team of scientists suggest using urine to make concrete on the Moon in order to build a lunar base with readily available resources.
articles.content:
